form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: LIST OF APPROVED PHYSICIANS FOR MEDICAL EXAMINATIONS FOR VISAS, NARA, 8/17/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL KARACHI, PAKISTAN LIST OF APPROVED PHYSICIANS FOR MEDICAL EXAMINATIONS FOR VISAS THE FOLLOWING PHYSICIANS IN KARACHI, LAHORE AND ISLAMABAD HAVE BEEN APPROVED BY THE AMERICAN CONSULATE FOR PURPOSES OF MEDICAL EXAMINATIONS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS. MEDICAL EXAMINATIONS ARE REQUIRED AS PART OF AN APPLICATION FOR AN IMMIGRANT VISA TO THE UNITED STATES, MUST BE COMPLETED AND BROUGHT AT THE TIME OF THE INTERVIEW. THEY ARE TO BE DONE FROM ONE OF THE FOLLOWING DOCTORS: (° ) DR. MOHAMMAD NAEEM-UL-HAQUE (2) DR. S.M. HOSAIN AL-HAROON BUILDING, °0 THE POLI CLINIC GARDEN ROAD, ROOM "J" 124-T-2 MAIN TARIQ ROAD 3RD FLOOR, KARACHI NEAR TELEGRAPH OFFICE PHONE: 7726043 P.E.C.H.S., KARACHI PHONES: 4553728 - 4555993 CLINIC TIMINGS: SAT TO WED. CLINIC TIMINGS: SAT TO THU 4:30PM TO 7:30PM 5:30PM TO 7:30PM THURSDAY & FRIDAY CLOSED. FRIDAY CLOSED 3) DR. MUHAMMAD IJAZ UL HASSAN 4) PROF. ALI AJWAD SHAH DR. AMIR UD DIN ROAD CLINIC 08:00 AM TO 03:00 PM AT 97-C/II, GULBERG 3 BUNGLOW NO. 1, INSIDE NEAR HUSSAIN CHOWK SHAIKH ZAYED HOSPITAL VIA LIBERTY MARKET, LAHORE NEW MUSLIM TOWN, LAHORE PHONES 878515, 878339, 875308 PHONES: 864232, 865731, 869684 EVENING CLINIC CLINIC TIMINGS: FROM 04:00 PM TO 06:00 PM AT 09:00 AM TO 01:00 PM PUNJAB MEDICAL CENTER 04:00 PM TO 08:00 PM 5-GULBERG (JAIL ROAD) LAHORE NEXT TO IRANIAN CULTURAL CENTER PHONES: 874302, 877335 5) DR. S. M. MALIK 6) DR. ALI RAZA JAN HOUSE NC. 12, STREET 30 AZIZ NURSING HOME F-6/1, ISLAMABAD SAIDPUR ROAD, RAWALPINDI PHONE: 828556 PHONES: 413913, 413914, 413915 CLINIC TIMINGS CLINIC TIMINGS 05:30 PM TO 07:30 PM 10:00 AM TO 01:30 PM 06:00 PM TO 08:30 PM
